name: Age Re-perfect body

name: brown
description: Now you can have the dark-to-light ombr� trend in a glamorous and subtle approach. Superior Preference Ombr� Touch illuminates your look with just a touch of ombre, adding streaks fo light to the lengths and tips of your hair.

description: From your favorite nail color, now comes new Colour Riche Eyeliner. This perfect pencil glides on and blends easily to help you create your favorite eye looks from a smoldering smoky eye (smudger included!) to a well-defined cat eye.

description: Our lightweight primer formula accelerates your routine by cutting blow dry time while protecting hair from heat damage.

description: Our high-performance, alcohol-free cream helps to soften, tame and define curls. Shapes curls with 24 hour hi-definition and helps calm frizz for perfect curls from roots to ends.
